name: Zombies Incoming!! An AR Adventure 🧟‍♂️
description:
The Zombies – ugly, rotten, hungry, extremely violent creatures and dead too? – have invaded your neighborhood!

You are alone at home.. your parents are out of town, your girlfriend had dumped you last week and your neighbors, hmm., well you don't have any.

In the middle of the town at night with a sliver of moonlight, you are armed with a shotgun and unlimited ammo.., maybe. Do you have what it takes to survive the zombie outbreak?

How to Play?
🧟‍♂️ Look around you by moving your smartphone.
🧟‍♂️ See those zombies out there?
🧟‍♂️ Run away., if you can!
🧟‍♂️ Cannot run or hide? Then,
🧟‍♂️ Tap on the zombies to shoot them.

How to Score & Tips
🧟‍♂️ You only have 5 lives. You will lose 1 life when a zombie reaches you.
🧟‍♂️ There are 2 types of zombies –
🧟‍♂️🧟‍♂️ Walking Zombies
🧟‍♂️🧟‍♂️ Crawling Zombies
🧟‍♂️ White Zombies give more points than Green Zombies.
🧟‍♂️ The Zombies become faster with time, along with the score.
🧟‍♂️ Survive for as long as you can! There's no time limit!!
